description:
Here's a private 2BD in Brooklyn. Steps from major transportation and a supermarket.

Beautiful, recently renovated 2 bedroom in the middle of Brooklyn. Roku TV's for better entertainment, with added cable TV in the bedroom. The kitchen is available for use, feel free to use whatever is available.

You have complete access to whatever is inside of the home.

We are right down in the basement if you need anything

Our neighborhood is close to everything. Lots of food, transportation, and a hospital all in walking distance.

Our place is steps away from major transportation
name: Chill 2BD in Brooklyn
review: Ms. Josephine's property was beautiful, well decorated and comfortable.  She was helpful upon check in and very easy going.  I'd recommend this property to travelers and I will book again.
